tool.name: Create.database
tool.description: creates a database file from a list, repnames, repfasta and contaxonomy file

param.name: otu
param.label: list or shared - OTU List of Shared

param.name: nameOrCount
param.label: repname/count - Representative sequences
param.help: rep.name file or rep.count_table file generated by get.oturep

param.name: constaxonomy
param.label: constaxonomy - Consensus Taxonomy
param.help: consensus taxonomy file output by classify.otu

param.name: label
param.label: label - OTU Labels
param.help: Select exactly one label. If none selected, first label in your list or shared file will be used

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documentation**
The create.database_ command reads a list_ or shared_ file, .cons.taxonomy, .rep.fasta, .rep.names and optional group file, and creates a database file.
.. _list: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _shared: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Shared_file .. _create.database: https://www.mothur.org/wiki/Create.database
